name: Capsul Shooter 1
description:
This is a very simple Top-Down-Shooter with simple mechanics and a simple goal: try to live as long as possible and kill the enemies!

I made this in my free time and I know it has some little bugs but I always had fun playing it.

Including:

- 2 different Enemies

- 2 different Drops (Aid and spezial Ammo)

- fix Ammo Spawn Points

Quick Tip: Have an eye on your Ammo and try to pick the Ammopack as often as you can.

Post your Highscore in the Comments

Average Roundtime: 3-6 min

playable with:  Keyboard and Mouse
